function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Neighborhood-scale inequities in access to social resources leading to health disparities","Impact":"Increased spread of contagious diseases and reinforcement of health inequalities","Mitigation":"Increased access to social resources at the neighborhood level and addressing health disparities","Technologies":"Community health programs, social support networks, access to healthcare services","People":"Residents of neighborhoods with limited access to social resources","Owner":"Local governments, community organizations"},{"Description":"Inability to untangle the complexities of multi-factorial pathways through which planning impacts urban health","Impact":"Difficulty in identifying and addressing the root causes of health disparities and contagious disease spread","Mitigation":"Integration of environmental and human health factors, multi-disciplinary collaboration in planning and public health","Technologies":"Data analytics, urban planning software, public health research methods","People":"Urban planners, public health professionals, researchers","Owner":"Planning and public health institutions"},{"Description":"Impact of urbanization on zoonoses in the Global South","Impact":"Increased risk of zoonotic disease emergence, transmission, and outbreak in urban areas","Mitigation":"Implementing zoonotic disease surveillance and control measures, improving access to healthcare services","Technologies":"Zoonotic disease monitoring systems, GIS mapping of zoonotic disease hotspots, telemedicine and mobile health clinics","People":"Residents of urban areas in the Global South","Owner":"Global health organizations, local healthcare providers"}]}
